original_text: So Saul removed him from his presence and made him a commander of a thousand. And he went out and came in before the people.
korean_text: 그러므로 사울이 그를 자기 곁에서 떠나게 하고 그를 천부장으로 삼으매 그가 백성 앞에 출입하며

sentences.original_text: So Saul removed him from his presence
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사울은 그를 자기 앞에서 멀리했다

sentences.original_text: and made him a commander of a thousand.
And he went out and came in
